data.category: As a Developer, my strong suit is to create web applications using the latest technologies, such as React, Next.js, Angular and TanStack.

data.chunk_text: I've work with NextJS in my last project, where I created web application for a school, where I used Zustand, Prisma ORM, Redis and Cypress
I also have work with Angular in Intellysis, with Redux and RxJS
I also have work many other framework in sites and school projects , such as TanStack, Fluter, Springboot
This website is created with Convex, Clerk and Shadcn
I want a remote job, where I cant work from anywhere, and I can have a flexible schedule
I also have experience working with GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and AWS (Amazon web Services)
I also have experience working with Docker and Containerization
I currently studying Computer Science at PUCMM (Pontificia Universidad Madre y Maestra)
I have many diplomas in web development, such as React from online platforms
In 2023, i won the first place in the annual hackthon, promoted by VoiceTeam
I studied in Cinncinatus Institute of Craftmanship, as complementary education to my technical high school, where I learned about programming and web development
In my way to be a computer science engineer, I have learned about many topics, such as algorithms, data structures, databases, and operative system
I would like to work with React,preferably NextJS

extra.chunk_text: I'm Nelcido, I to play video games, I really like to play Survival horror ones, like Resident Evil, Dead Space and Silent Hill
I'm Nelcido, I also like to read manga a books, specially science fiction and dark fantasy ones, like Berserk or Dune
When i have time, I also like to watch a movie, o series, like Arcane
I have a big imagination, I'm usually searching for new things to develop
I dont like to stress, so i tried to take the things chill as i can
